page.title: 20The View From My Window
page.content: Out of my bedroom window I can see the railway line and Kirby Lane.In the winter and sometimes in the summer, when there has been a big wind, you can see right over the railway line to the houses on the other side.All the trains which run on this line are trains which carry goods.They do not carry people. {Elizabeth. The view out of the bedroom is a road, a field, with horses, and a cottage with a thatched roof.I like what I see. {Gemma B. From my bedroom window I can see my mum's flowers and shrubs and the tarmac.I can see grass,the pavement and the road.I can see our neighbours bungalow and George's house.I can see cars and people walking dogs. {Maria.
